info.title: locale-api
info.summary: Locale is a developer tool that provides geographic information of Nigeria.
info.description: Locale’s API shows Nigeria’s regions, states, and local government areas(LGAs). It's a very useful tool for the thousands of businesses building for Nigeria’s 200M+ population size.

post.summary: Create New User with auto-generated apiKey

default.description: In the response body, the new user is generated with a success message and an apiKey.

requestBody.description: Post the necessary fields for the API to create a new user.

post.description: Create a new user with an apiKey generated when sign up.

200.description: An array of states objects, each state containing information about the state.

get.description: This endpoint retrieve all states in Nigeria and information about each states

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: An apiKey generated when signed up, must be provided in the header

get.summary: Get a specific state in Nigeria

200.description: An object of a specific state with its information

get.description: This endpoint retrieve a specific state with all information about the state, by providing state_code as params

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: An apiKey generated when signed up, must be provided in the header

parameters.name: :state_code
parameters.description: A state code (name of a Nigeria state) must be provided to get a specific Nigeria state

get.summary: Get a specific Nigeria state with all its LGAs

200.description: An object of a specific state with an array of all its LGAs, containing their meta data.

get.description: This endpoint retrieve a specific state and all its LGAs, containing information about the state and its LGAs

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: An apiKey generated when signed up, must be provided in the header

parameters.name: :state_name
parameters.description: A state name (name of a Nigeria state) must be provided to get a specific Nigeria state with all its LGAs

get.summary: Get all Local Government Area of a specific state in Nigeria

200.description: An array of LGAs objects of a specific Nigeria state

get.description: This endpoint retrieve a list of all Local Government Areas for a specific state by providing the state's state_code

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: An apiKey generated when signed up, must be provided in the header

parameters.name: :state_code
parameters.description: A state code (name of a Nigeria state) must be provided to get all LGAs of a specific Nigeria state

get.summary: Get all towns under a specific state in Nigeria

200.description: An array of towns objects of a specific state in Nigeria

get.description: This endpoint retrieve a list of towns within a specific state in Nigeria by providing the state's state_code

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: An apiKey generated when signed up, must be provided in the header

parameters.name: :state_code
parameters.description: A state code (name of a Nigeria state) must be provided to get all towns in a specific Nigeria state

200.description: An array of all regions in Nigeria

get.description: This endpoints retrieve all the six regions in Nigeria, containing information of each region

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: An apiKey generated when signed up, must be provided in the header

get.summary: Get a specific region in Nigeria with all its states within the region

200.description: An array of a specific region objects in Nigeria

get.description: This endpoint retrieve a specific region in Nigeria by providing a region_code as a params

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: An apiKey generated when signed up, must be provided in the header

parameters.name: :region_code
parameters.description: A region code (abbreviation of a Nigeria region e.g. NC) must be provided to get a specific Nigeria state

User.description: This model create a new user and an apiKey is auto-generated when the user is created
User.title: userModel

api-key.name: api-key
api-key.description: Locale APIs should be protected and every developer who tries to access the API should have an API key to authenticate their request.
